question: Mobile Integrated Network Terminal (MINT), which was making news recently, is associated with which organisation?
explanation:
The Indian Army is in the process of procuring Mobile Integrated Network Terminal (MINT) systems under Make II Category of Defence Acquisition Procedure DAP 2020.
The system is a portable, state of art communication solution with satellite support and wireless access system to support voice, video and data. The systems will be procured from a domestic company.
